# Inukaitakerunomikoto

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Ninjutsu
- Class: Offensive, Supplementary
- Range: Short, Mid, Long
- Users: Momoshiki Ōtsutsuki
- Media: Anime, Manga, Game, Movie canon

## Summary
A technique where the user creates ferocious canine chakra avatars from the land itself. They will pursue their targets relentlessly in order to clamp down on them with their jaws, restraining and crushing them, and their tracking speed is so great that they were even able to catch Sasuke Uchiha.

## Notes
- The user can also transmit other ninjutsu through the body of one of the canines so that, after it grabs hold of a target, it will result in a direct hit.
- One of his retainers was named .
- The tale of Momotarō, which is the source of Momoshiki's name, is based on this legend.
- Here, Momotarō befriends a dog, a monkey and a pheasant instead, and it is said that the dog is based on Takeru Inukai.
